Yacine Hammouda
Process Engineer at Petrofac International LTD
Process Engineer
Company name
Petrofac · Full-time
Dates employed and Duration
Oct 2011 – Present • 12 yrs 4 mos
Position location
Sharjah UAE
Position summary
- EPC Project / Proposal deputy lead and area lead with excellent managerial abilities 
 - Managed successfully and efficiently remote engineering center deliverables (6+ engineers) and interfaces with clients, suppliers, management, and other disciplines 
 - Delivered large and complex Oil & Gas projects from the conceptual design stage to the execution 
 - Developed and managed multiple complex Vendor and Licensor packages up to the execution of purchase orders 
 - Fully responsibility for oil & gas plant steady state simulation, H&MB, and PFD’s 
 - Mastering following Yacine Hammouda
Process Engineer at Petrofac International LTD
Process Engineer
Company name
Petrofac · Full-time
Dates employed and Duration
Oct 2011 – Present • 12 yrs 4 mos
Position location
Sharjah UAE
Position summary
- EPC Project / Proposal deputy lead and area lead with excellent managerial abilities 
 - Managed successfully and efficiently remote engineering center deliverables (6+ engineers) and interfaces with clients, suppliers, management, and other disciplines 
 - Delivered large and complex Oil & Gas projects from the conceptual design stage to the execution 
 - Developed and managed multiple complex Vendor and Licensor packages up to the execution of purchase orders 
 - Fully responsibility for oil & gas plant steady state simulation, H&MB, and PFD’s 
 - Mastering following engineering softwares: 
 • Aspen Hysys 
 • Promax 
 • Pipesim 
 • Aspen Flare System Analyzer 
 • HTRI 
 • FluidFlow  
 • KORF 
 - Steady state flow assurance study for pipeline networks of Flow Lines, and Transfer Lines 
 - Experienced, qualified, and actively participating in plants design reviews, and HAZOP and SIL safety reviews 
 - P&ID Development. 
 - Review & validation of all engineering documents produced by engineering centers and suppliers 
 - Producing packages and licensed units specifications, and reviewing suppliers technical offers of Compressors Packages, CO2 Removal Unit, MRU for Gas and Condensate, Water Treatment (PWTP, WWTP, SWTU, RWTP, RO), Flare Packages, Fired Heaters, Thermal oxidizers, and VRU Packages 
 - Equipment design as per API/Shell DEP Codes and preparation of equipment specification datasheets for Vessels, Storage Tank, Pumps, Heat Exchangers, Columns, and Instrumentation IPDS 
 - Flare analysis 
 - Preparation and review of C&E Chart, Safeguarding Memorandum, and SAFE Chart  
 - Preparation of Utilities Balance and Summary 
 - Preparation of Chemicals and Catalysts MR’s, TBE’s, and PR’s 
 - Preparation of Equipment List, Line List, and Fluid List, TDR 
 - Providing technical guidance and peer mentorship to junior engineers 
 - Conduct trainings for client operators 
 - Typical Proposal activities including ITT documents review, SOW evaluation, raising TQ's, providing specification for Equipment and Packages RFQ's
·
Position title
Production Engineer
Company name
PLASTUBE · Full-time
Dates employed and Duration
Oct 2010 – Mar 2011 • 7 mos
Position location
-Ghardaia- Algeria
Position summary
Plastic and PVC pipes manufacture. 
 Main duties: 
 • Commissioning and star-up of new production facilities. 
 • Operators training. 
 • Production planning and management.
Education
·
School name
Suvidya Institute of Technology
Degree details
Degree name
Corporate Technical Training Certificate •
Field of study
Process Engineering of Oil & Gas EPC industry •
Grade
Distinction
Dates attended or expected graduation
2011 – 2012
Degree summary
Introduction to Oil and Gas industry, Introduction to different Process & Utility equipment, their use and selection, Preparation of PFD's, P&ID's, Line List, Equipment List, Alarm and Trip List, Equipment Datasheets (Vessels, Pumps, Heat Exchangers, Tanks, ... Etc.). Vessels Design, Hydraulics, Heat Exchangers design, Columns design (try and packed), Compressors studies (Hydraulics, Settleout), Tank venting requirements as per API 2000, PSV and RD sizing as per API 520, Solid handling, Conveying systems, Petroleum Rules and Layout considerations, recommendation practices for Oil Storage & Handling.
·
School name
FERHAT ABBAS UNIVERSITY -SETIF- ALGERIA.
Degree details
Degree name
Engineer •
Field of study
Process Engineer •
Grade
17.5/20
Dates attended or expected graduation
2005 – 2010
Degree summary
Professionals Skills Covered: 
 - Fundamental sciences. 
 - Chemistry, Petrochemistry, Organic Chemistry, Technical of Analysis, Unit Operations (Distillation,Extraction, Absorption ...), Industrial Process, Energy. 
 - Mechanics, Resistance of Materials, Vibration, Science of Materials, Fluid Mechanics. 
 - Data Processing, Industrial Safety.

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
